Some events (mgmt guidance, stock splits, S&P incl) impact price but not value. PTs are based on value. PM performance/bonus are tied to price.Try to understand both.

Investors should understand the distinction between a stock’s value and price. Value is based on the future cash flows or earnings discounted back to the present. Price is where the stock trades or may trade by a certain date. I try to buy stocks where price is < 70% value. $tsla
